definitions.definition: ( also figuratively ) A brief or cursory look .
( also figuratively ) A quick movement that catches light , and causes a flash or glitter ; also, the flash or glitter.
( cricket ) A stroke in which the ball is hit with a bat held in a slanted manner .
( ichthyology ) Of certain juvenile fish , chiefly of the Cichlidae family : an act of rapidly touching the side of its parent 's body , usually to feed on mucus .

subdefinitions.definition: An act of striking and flying off in an oblique direction ; a deflection .
( figuratively ) An incidental or passing allusion or thought , often unfavourable , expressed on a topic .

main_definition: ( also figuratively ) A brief or cursory look .
secondary_definitions: ( also figuratively ) A quick movement that catches light , and causes a flash or glitter ; also, the flash or glitter.
( cricket ) A stroke in which the ball is hit with a bat held in a slanted manner .
( ichthyology ) Of certain juvenile fish , chiefly of the Cichlidae family : an act of rapidly touching the side of its parent 's body , usually to feed on mucus .

definitions.definition: Ellipsis of glance coal ( “ any hard, lustrous coal such as anthracite ” ) .
Any of various sulphides , mostly dark - coloured , which have a brilliant metallic lustre .
labels: obsolete except in the names of certain minerals
definitions.label_groups: obsolete except in the names of certain minerals
